section.title: Context
section.paragraph: This ADR describes the addition of another course app named Live. The Live app will be used to configure a video conferencing tool for the course. The will be available as a new Tab in the course experience. The tool will be added as an LTI integration. We will currently support only Zoom as a video conferencing provider. But other providers can also be added later.
